scripts.babel:
echo "--- Running Babel. This build target is just for debugging any build issues, and not part of the normal build
";./node_modules/.bin/babel ./ts --out-dir _build --extensions ".ts,.tsx" --source-maps
scripts.package:
echo "
--- Building and packaging...
"; set -e;rm -rf dist;mkdir dist;npm run build;npm run rollup;npm run copy-defs;npm run copy-package-json;npm run copy-css
scripts.copy-package-json:
echo "
--- Copying package jsons into distribution directories...
"; node ./scripts/copy-package-json.js
scripts.copy-defs:
echo "
--- Copying typescript definitions into distribution directories...
"; node ./scripts/copy-typescript-defs.js
scripts.create-distribution:
set -e;npm run package;echo "
-- Building apidocs...
";npm run apidocs; echo "
-- Building distribution packages...
";node ./scripts/create-packages.js;
